blocks.name: ac6sf2
blocks.content: Alternate version of ~ ac6 with bound-variable hypothesis. (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-2008.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ac6sf2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, w1))))
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylbi(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, w1))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(hs0, c1, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(hs0, c1, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))
  cbvrexf(s1, hs0, c1, w0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, w0)
  sbequ12(s1, hs0, w0)
  ac6s(s0, hs0, s2, c0, c1, wsb(hs0, s1, w0), w1)
  sbhypf(hs0, s1, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), w0, w1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
  diff.wsb.s(s2, hs0, s1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cv(s2), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ac6sf2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, w0))‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2,((s2 : c0 ‚Üí c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1))))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w1)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ (s1 =(s2 ` s0)‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylbi(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, w0)), ‚àÉ(s2,((s2 : c0 ‚Üí c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w1))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1,[hs0 / s1]w0)))
  ralbii(s0, c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, w0), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1,[hs0 / s1]w0))
  cbvrexf(s1, hs0, c1, w0, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, w0)
  sbequ12(s1, hs0, w0)
  ac6s(s0, hs0, s2, c0, c1, [hs0 / s1]w0, w1)
  sbhypf(hs0, s1, (s2 ` s0), w0, w1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
  diff.wsb.s(s2, hs0, s1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: fnresin
blocks.content: Restriction of a function with a subclass of its domain. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnresin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(cres(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2)))
} = {
  mpbid(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(cres(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2)), wfn(cres(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(c1, c2)))
  fnresin1(c0, c1, c2)
  fneq1d(cres(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(c1, c2), cres(c0, c2), wfn(c0, c1))
  syl5eq(cres(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cres(c0, c2), cin(cres(c0, c1), cres(c0, c2)), wfn(c0, c1))
  resindi(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6eq(cin(cres(c0, c1), cres(c0, c2)), cres(c0, c2), cin(c0, cres(c0, c2)), wfn(c0, c1))
  ineq1d(cres(c0, c1), cres(c0, c2), c0, wfn(c0, c1))
  fnresdm(c0, c1)
  eqtr3i(cin(c0, cres(c0, c2)), cres(c0, c2), cin(cres(c0, c2), c0))
  incom(cres(c0, c2), c0)
  mpbi(wceq(cin(cres(c0, c2), c0), cres(c0, c2)), wss(cres(c0, c2), c0))
  resss(c0, c2)
  df-ss(cres(c0, c2), c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnresin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[Fn]c1 ‚Üí(c0 |` c2)[Fn](c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
} = {
  mpbid(c0[Fn]c1, (c0 |` c2)[Fn](c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (c0 |`(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))[Fn](c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
  fnresin1(c0, c1, c2)
  fneq1d((c0 |`(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)), (c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (c0 |` c2), c0[Fn]c1)
  syl5eq((c0 |`(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)), (c0 |` c2), ((c0 |` c1)‚ãÇ(c0 |` c2)), c0[Fn]c1)
  resindi(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6eq(((c0 |` c1)‚ãÇ(c0 |` c2)), (c0 |` c2), (c0 ‚ãÇ(c0 |` c2)), c0[Fn]c1)
  ineq1d((c0 |` c1), (c0 |` c2), c0, c0[Fn]c1)
  fnresdm(c0, c1)
  eqtr3i((c0 ‚ãÇ(c0 |` c2)), (c0 |` c2), ((c0 |` c2)‚ãÇ c0))
  incom((c0 |` c2), c0)
  mpbi(((c0 |` c2)‚ãÇ c0)=(c0 |` c2), (c0 |` c2)‚äÜ c0)
  resss(c0, c2)
  df-ss((c0 |` c2), c0)
}

blocks.name: f1o3d
blocks.content: Describe an implicit one-to-one onto function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1o3d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wceq(ccnv(c0), cmpt(s0, c2, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c1, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c4, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wb(wceq(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wceq(ccnv(c0), cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))
  sylanbrc(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1), wfn(ccnv(c0), c2))
  mpbird(w0, wfn(c0, c1), wfn(cmpt(s1, c1, c4), c1))
  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s1, c1, c4), c1), wral(s1, c1, wcel(c4, c2)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, w0, wcel(c4, c2))
  fnmpt(s1, c1, c4, c2, cmpt(s1, c1, c4))
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c1, c4))
  fneq1d(c0, c1, cmpt(s1, c1, c4), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wfn(ccnv(c0), c2), wfn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c2))
  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c1)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  fnmpt(s0, c2, c3, c1, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  fneq1d(ccnv(c0), c2, cmpt(s0, c2, c3), w0)
  dff1o4(c0, c1, c2)
  3eqtr4d(ccnv(c0), cmpt(s0, c2, c3), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3))), w0)
  opabbidv(s0, s1, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))
  impbida(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))
  jcai(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3))
  impr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c4, c2))
  eleq1a(c4, c2, cv(s0))
  imp32(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))
  com34(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3))
  exp42(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c3))
  biimpar(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c3))
  jcai(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3))), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))
  impr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wi(wceq(cv(s1), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c3, c1))
  eleq1a(c3, c1, cv(s1))
  imp32(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))
  com34(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))
  com23(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(wceq(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))
  exp42(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), c4))
  biimpa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), c4))
  syl6eq(ccnv(c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))), ccnv(copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))), w0)
  cnveqd(c0, copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))), w0)
  syl6eq(c0, copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))), cmpt(s1, c1, c4), w0)
  df-mpt(s1, s0, c1, c4)
  cnvopab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))))
  df-mpt(s0, s1, c2, c3)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm f1o3d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 : c1 ‚Üî c2)‚àß `' c0 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c4 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí c3 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s1 = c3 ‚Üî s0 = c4))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c2), `' c0 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3))
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c2), c0[Fn]c1, `' c0[Fn]c2)
  mpbird(w0, c0[Fn]c1, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4)[Fn]c1)
  syl(w0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4)[Fn]c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà c2))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, w0, c4 ‚àà c2)
  fnmpt(s1, c1, c4, c2, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4))
  eqid((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4))
  fneq1d(c0, c1, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4), w0)
  mpbird(w0, `' c0[Fn]c2, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)[Fn]c2)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)[Fn]c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c1))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, c3 ‚àà c1)
  fnmpt(s0, c2, c3, c1, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3))
  fneq1d(`' c0, c2, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3), w0)
  dff1o4(c0, c1, c2)
  3eqtr4d(`' c0, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3), { < s0, s1 > |(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c4)}, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 = c3)}, w0)
  opabbidv(s0, s1, w0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c4), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 = c3))
  impbida(w0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c4), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 = c3))
  jcai((w0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c4)), s0 ‚àà c2, s1 = c3)
  impr(w0, s1 ‚àà c1, s0 = c4, s0 ‚àà c2)
  syl((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), (s0 = c4 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà c2)
  eleq1a(c4, c2, s0)
  imp32(w0, s1 ‚àà c1, s0 = c4, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí s1 = c3))
  com34(w0, s1 ‚àà c1, s0 = c4, s0 ‚àà c2, s1 = c3)
  exp42(w0, s1 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà c2, s0 = c4, s1 = c3)
  biimpar((w0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)), s0 = c4, s1 = c3)
  jcai((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 = c3)), s1 ‚àà c1, s0 = c4)
  impr(w0, s0 ‚àà c2, s1 = c3, s1 ‚àà c1)
  syl((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2), (s1 = c3 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà c1), c3 ‚àà c1)
  eleq1a(c3, c1, s1)
  imp32(w0, s0 ‚àà c2, s1 = c3, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí s0 = c4))
  com34(w0, s0 ‚àà c2, s1 = c3, s1 ‚àà c1, s0 = c4)
  com23(w0, s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c1, (s1 = c3 ‚Üí s0 = c4))
  exp42(w0, s1 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà c2, s1 = c3, s0 = c4)
  biimpa((w0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)), s1 = c3, s0 = c4)
  syl6eq(`' c0, { < s0, s1 > |(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c4)}, `' { < s1, s0 > |(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c4)}, w0)
  cnveqd(c0, { < s1, s0 > |(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c4)}, w0)
  syl6eq(c0, { < s1, s0 > |(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c4)}, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c4), w0)
  df-mpt(s1, s0, c1, c4)
  cnvopab(s1, s0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c4))
  a1i(w0, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 = c3)})
  df-mpt(s0, s1, c2, c3)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: f1rnen
blocks.content: Equinumerosity of the range of an injective function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jul-2023.)

blocks.name: rinvf1o
blocks.content: Sufficient conditions for the restriction of an involution to be a bijection. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rinvf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wf1o(cres(c0, c1), c1, c2)
  -| wfun(c0)
  -| wceq(ccnv(c0), c0)
  -| wss(cima(c0, c1), c2)
  -| wss(cima(c0, c2), c1)
  -| wss(c1, cdm(c0))
  -| wss(c2, cdm(c0))
} = {
  mpbi(wf1o(cres(c0, c1), c1, c2), wf1o(cres(c0, c1), c1, cima(c0, c1)))
  mp2an(wf1o(cres(c0, c1), c1, cima(c0, c1)), wf1(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  mpbir2an(wf1(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)), wfun(ccnv(c0)))
  mpbi(wf(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0)), wfun(c0))
  fdmrn(c0)
  mpbir(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wfun(c0))
  funeqi(ccnv(c0), c0)
  df-f1(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  f1ores(c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0), c1)
  ax-mp(wb(wf1o(cres(c0, c1), c1, cima(c0, c1)), wf1o(cres(c0, c1), c1, c2)), wceq(cima(c0, c1), c2))
  eqssi(cima(c0, c1), c2)
  sseqtri(c2, cima(c0, c1), cima(ccnv(c0), c1))
  mpbi(wss(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c1)), wss(cima(c0, c2), c1))
  mp2an(wb(wss(cima(c0, c2), c1), wss(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), c1))), wfun(c0), wss(c2, cdm(c0)))
  funimass3(c0, c2, c1)
  imaeq1i(ccnv(c0), c1, c0)
  f1oeq3(cima(c0, c1), c2, cres(c0, c1), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rinvf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 |` c1): c1 ‚Üî c2)
  ‚ä£ Fun(c0)

} = {

  ax-mp((((c0 |` c1): c1 ‚Üî(c0 " c1))‚Üî((c0 |` c1): c1 ‚Üî c2)), (c0 " c1)= c2)
  eqssi((c0 " c1), c2)
  sseqtri(c2, (c0 " c1), (`' c0 " c1))

  mp2an(((c0 " c2)‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî c2 ‚äÜ(`' c0 " c1)), Fun(c0), c2 ‚äÜ dom(c0))
  funimass3(c0, c2, c1)
  imaeq1i(`' c0, c1, c0)
  f1oeq3((c0 " c1), c2, (c0 |` c1), c1)
}

  syl3anc(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ((s0 ‚àò c6)=((hs0 ‚àò `' c6)‚àò c6)‚Üî s0 =(hs0 ‚àò `' c6)), (c6 : c5 ‚Ü† c4), s0[Fn]c4, (hs0 ‚àò `' c6)[Fn]c4)
  syl(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c6 : c5 ‚Ü† c4), (c6 : c5 ‚Üî c4))
  ad2antrr(w0, s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2, (c6 : c5 ‚Üî c4))
  f1ofo(c6, c5, c4)
  syl(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), s0[Fn]c4, s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4))
  syl6eleq(s0, (c3[‚Ü¶]c4), c1, ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  simplr(w0, s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  elmapfn(s0, c3, c4)
  adantlr(w0, s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2, (hs0 ‚àò `' c6)[Fn]c4)
  syl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (hs0 ‚àò `' c6)[Fn]c4, (hs0 ‚àò `' c6)‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4))
  syl21anc((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (hs0 ‚àò `' c6)‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4), c3 ‚àà c9, c4 ‚àà c8, ((hs0 ‚àò `' c6): c4 ‚Üí c3))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c9)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c8)
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ((hs0 ‚àò `' c6): c4 ‚Üí c3), (hs0 : c5 ‚Üí c3), (`' c6 : c4 ‚Üí c5))
  syl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (hs0 : c5 ‚Üí c3), hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c5))
  syl6eleq(hs0, (c3[‚Ü¶]c5), c2, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  elmapi(hs0, c3, c5)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, (`' c6 : c4 ‚Üí c5))
  3syl(w0, (`' c6 : c4 ‚Üí c5), (c6 : c5 ‚Üî c4), (`' c6 : c4 ‚Üî c5))
  f1ocnv(c6, c5, c4)
  f1of(`' c6, c4, c5)
  fco(hs0, c5, c3, `' c6, c4)
  biimpar((c3 ‚àà c9 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c8), ((hs0 ‚àò `' c6): c4 ‚Üí c3), (hs0 ‚àò `' c6)‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4))
  elmapg(c3, c9, c4, c8, (hs0 ‚àò `' c6))
  elmapfn((hs0 ‚àò `' c6), c3, c4)
  cocan2(c6, c5, c4, s0, (hs0 ‚àò `' c6))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àò c6))
  diff.ccom.s(s0, hs0, `' c6)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: cofmpt2
blocks.content: Express composition of a maps-to function with another function in a maps-to notation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm cofmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1)))), wceq(c1, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c3, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(ccom(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c4), cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(c2, cv(s1)))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(ccom(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c5), wf(c2, c3, c0))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, c5, w0)
  fcompt(s1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c5, c2, c3)
  mpteq2dva(s1, c3, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), c4, w0)
  fvmptd2(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c4, c0, c1, c6, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), wceq(c1, c4))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s1), c3, c2, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(c4, c6))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, cv(s1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cofmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àò c2)=(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 =(c2 ` s1))‚Üí c1 = c4)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 : c3 ‚Üí c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àò c2), (s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4), (s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)`(c2 ` s1))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àò c2)=(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)`(c2 ` s1))), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1): c0 ‚Üí c5), (c2 : c3 ‚Üí c0))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, c5, w0)
  fcompt(s1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), c0, c5, c2, c3)
  mpteq2dva(s1, c3, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)`(c2 ` s1)), c4, w0)
  fvmptd2(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), (c2 ` s1), c4, c0, c1, c6, (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  adantlr(w0, s1 ‚àà c3, s0 =(c2 ` s1), c1 = c4)
  ffvelrnda(s1, c3, c2, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, s1 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c6)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, s1 ‚àà c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: f1mptrn
blocks.content: Express injection for a mapping operation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1mptrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wfun(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wreu(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wfun(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wral(s1, c2, wreu(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))
  jca(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wral(s1, c2, wreu(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, w0, wreu(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  sylbir(wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wral(s1, c2, wreu(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))), wfun(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2))
  f1ompt(s0, s1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  simp2bi(wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2), wfun(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2))
  dff1o2(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm f1mptrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí Fun(`'(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 = c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, Fun(`'(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 = c1))))
  jca(w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 = c1)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c1 ‚àà c2)
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, w0, ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 = c1))
  sylbir((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 = c1))), Fun(`'(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1): c0 ‚Üî c2))
  f1ompt(s0, s1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), c0, c2, c1)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  simp2bi(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1): c0 ‚Üî c2), Fun(`'(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[Fn]c0, ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))= c2)
  dff1o2((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), c0, c2)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: dfimafnf
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the image of a function. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfimafnf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wceq(cima(c0, c1), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6eq(cima(c0, c1), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cab(s0, wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))))
  syl6reqr(cima(c0, c1), cab(s0, wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), cab(s0, wrex(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))))
  abbidv(s0, wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))
  rexbidva(hs0, c1, wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))
  imp31(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))
  syl9r(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  ssel(c1, cdm(c0), cv(hs0))
  ex(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))
  syl5bbr(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))
  eqcom(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))
  funbrfvb(c0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  dfima2(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  abbii(s0, wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  cbvrexf(hs0, s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfeq2(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))
  nffv(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s1), c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  diff.wfun.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, cdm(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfimafnf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0))‚Üí(c0 " c1)= { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))})
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6eq((c0 " c1), { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1))}, { s0 | ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` hs0))}, (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)))
  syl6reqr((c0 " c1), { s0 | ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` hs0))}, { s0 | ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0[c0]s0)}, (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)))
  abbidv(s0, (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` hs0)), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0[c0]s0))
  rexbidva(hs0, c1, (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)), s0 =(c0 ` hs0), hs0[c0]s0)
  imp31(Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0), hs0 ‚àà c1, (s0 =(c0 ` hs0)‚Üî hs0[c0]s0))
  syl9r(Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0), hs0 ‚àà c1, (s0 =(c0 ` hs0)‚Üî hs0[c0]s0), hs0 ‚àà dom(c0))
  ssel(c1, dom(c0), hs0)
  ex(Fun(c0), hs0 ‚àà dom(c0), (s0 =(c0 ` hs0)‚Üî hs0[c0]s0))
  syl5bbr((Fun(c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà dom(c0)), s0 =(c0 ` hs0), hs0[c0]s0, (c0 ` hs0)= s0)
  eqcom((c0 ` hs0), s0)
  funbrfvb(c0, hs0, s0)
  dfima2(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  abbii(s0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` hs0)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c0 ` s1)))
  cbvrexf(hs0, s1, c1, s0 =(c0 ` hs0), s0 =(c0 ` s1))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfeq2(s1, s0, (c0 ` hs0))
  nffv(s1, c0, hs0)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfv(hs0, s0 =(c0 ` s1))
  eqeq2d(s0, (c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` s1), hs0 = s1)
  fveq2(hs0, s1, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0))
  diff.wfun.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.w((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ dom(c0)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 =(c0 ` s1))
}

blocks.name: funimass4f
blocks.content: Membership relation for the values of a function whose image is a subclass. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm funimass4f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wb(wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))))

  adantr(wa(wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wceq(cima(c0, c1), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))))

blocks.name: elimampt
blocks.content: Membership in the image of a mapping. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm elimampt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cima(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(c0, c3))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c4, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl5bb(w0, wcel(c0, cima(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))))
  eleq2i(c0, cima(c1, c2), crn(cres(c1, c2)))
  df-ima(c1, c2)
  bitrd(w0, wcel(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))), wcel(c0, crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), wss(c2, c4))
  eleq2d(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2)), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), wss(c2, c4))
  rneqd(cres(c1, c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c3), wss(c2, c4))
  syl5eq(cres(c1, c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cres(cmpt(s0, c4, c3), c2), wss(c2, c4))
  reseq1i(c1, c2, cmpt(s0, c4, c3))
  resmpt(s0, c2, c4, c3)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(c0, c3))), wcel(c0, c5))
  elrnmpt(s0, c0, c5, cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c2, c3)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
}

blocks.name: suppss2f
blocks.content: Show that the support of a function is contained in a set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Jun-2017.) (Revised by AV, 1-Sep-2020.)

thm suppss2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2), c3))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl5eqss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2), c3, co(cmpt(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), csupp, c2), w0)
  oveq1i(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2, cmpt(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))

  nfcv(hs0, c0)

  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  suppss2(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2, c3, c4, w0)
  mpbi(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2)), wsb(hs0, s0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(c1, c2))))
  sbt(hs0, s0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(c1, c2)))
  bitri(wsb(hs0, s0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(c1, c2))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2)), wi(wsb(hs0, s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3)))), wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(c1, c2))))
  sbim(hs0, s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(c1, c2))
  imbi12i(wsb(hs0, s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3)))), wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(c1, c2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2))
  bitri(wsb(hs0, s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c3))), wa(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3)))))
  sban(hs0, s0, w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3)))
  anbi12i(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c3)))
  sbf(hs0, s0, w0)
  clelsb3f(hs0, s0, cdif(c0, c3))
  nfdif(s0, c0, c3)
  bitri(wsb(hs0, s0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wceq(c1, c2)))
  sbsbc(hs0, s0, wceq(c1, c2))
  elv(hs0, wb(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2)))
  sbceq1g(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm suppss2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[supp]c2)‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)

  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl5eqss(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[supp]c2), c3, ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶[hs0 / s0]c1)[supp]c2), w0)
  oveq1i((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), csupp, c2, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶[hs0 / s0]c1))

  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  suppss2(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  mpbi(((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))‚Üí[hs0 / s0]c1 = c2), [hs0 / s0]((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))‚Üí c1 = c2))
  sbt(hs0, s0, ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))‚Üí c1 = c2))
  bitri([hs0 / s0]((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))‚Üí c1 = c2), ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))‚Üí[hs0 / s0]c1 = c2), ([hs0 / s0](w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))‚Üí[hs0 / s0]c1 = c2))
  sbim(hs0, s0, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3)), c1 = c2)
  imbi12i([hs0 / s0](w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3)), [hs0 / s0]c1 = c2, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3)), [hs0 / s0]c1 = c2)
  bitri([hs0 / s0](w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3)), ([hs0 / s0]w0 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3)))
  sban(hs0, s0, w0, s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))
  anbi12i([hs0 / s0]w0, [hs0 / s0]s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3), w0, hs0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))
  sbf(hs0, s0, w0)

  nfdif(s0, c0, c3)
  bitri([hs0 / s0]c1 = c2, [hs0 / s0]c1 = c2, [hs0 / s0]c1 = c2)
  sbsbc(hs0, s0, c1 = c2)
  elv(hs0, ([hs0 / s0]c1 = c2 ‚Üî[hs0 / s0]c1 = c2))
  sbceq1g(s0, hs0, universe, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

blocks.name: fovcld
blocks.content: Closure law for an operation. (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fovcld(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w3a(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c4, cxp(c1, c3), c5))
} = {
  sylc(w3a(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c3, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c5))))
  3simpc(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c3, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c5))))
  syl(w0, wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c3, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c5))), wf(c4, cxp(c1, c3), c5))
  simprbi(wf(c4, cxp(c1, c3), c5), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c3, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c5))), wfn(c4, cxp(c1, c3)))
  ffnov(hs0, hs1, c4, c1, c3, c5)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c5), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wcel(co(c0, c4, cv(hs1)), c5))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c5, co(c0, c4, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c4, cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(co(c0, c4, cv(hs1)), c5, co(c0, c4, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0, c4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, c4, cv(hs1)), c5))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5))
}

  simprbi((c4 :(c1 √ó c3)‚Üí c5), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,(hs0[c4]hs1)‚àà c5)), c4[Fn](c1 √ó c3))
  ffnov(hs0, hs1, c4, c1, c3, c5)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)

  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)

blocks.name: xppreima2
blocks.content: The preimage of a Cartesian product is the intersection of the preimages of each component function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: elunirn2
blocks.content: Condition for the membership in the union of the range of a function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm elunirn2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, c2))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(c0))))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, c2))), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(c0))), wrex(hs0, cdm(c0), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  adantl(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, c2)), wrex(hs0, cdm(c0), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  mpancom(wcel(c1, cfv(c0, c2)), wrex(hs0, cdm(c0), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c2, cdm(c0)))
  elfvdm(c1, c0, c2)
  rspcev(hs0, c2, cdm(c0), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  eleq2d(c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  adantr(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cuni(crn(c0))), wrex(hs0, cdm(c0), wcel(c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))
  elunirn(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, cfv(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

} = {

  adantl(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà(c0 ` c2), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà dom(c0), c1 ‚àà(c0 ` hs0)))
  mpancom(c1 ‚àà(c0 ` c2), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà dom(c0), c1 ‚àà(c0 ` hs0)), c2 ‚àà dom(c0))

  adantr(Fun(c0), c1 ‚àà(c0 ` c2), (c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(c0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà dom(c0), c1 ‚àà(c0 ` hs0))))
  elunirn(hs0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: abfmpunirn
blocks.content: Membership in a union of a mapping function-defined family of sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Sep-2016.)

thm abfmpunirn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wrex(s0, c2, w0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cab(s1, w1)))
  -| wcel(cab(s1, w1), universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wrex(s0, c2, w0))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wrex(s0, c2, w0))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wrex(s0, c2, w0))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  biadanii(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c1))), wcel(c0, universe), wrex(s0, c2, w0))
  elex(c0, cuni(crn(c1)))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c1))), wrex(s0, c2, w0), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cab(s1, w1))))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c1))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cab(s1, w1))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c1))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wfn(c1, c2))
  fnmpti(s0, c1, c2, cab(s1, w1))
  fnunirn(s0, c1, c2, c0)
  rexbiia(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cab(s1, w1)))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cab(s1, w1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cab(s1, w1)), wcel(cab(s1, w1), universe))
  fvmpt2(s0, c2, cab(s1, w1), universe, c1)
  rexbidv(s0, c2, wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cab(s1, w1)), w0)
  elabg(s1, c0, universe, w1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm abfmpunirn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, w0)))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ { s1 | w1 })

  ‚ä£ (s1 = c0 ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)

  a1ii((c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, w0))), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, w0))), d(s1, c2))
  biadanii(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(c1), c0 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, w0))
  elex(c0, ‚ãÉ ran(c1))
  syl5bb(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, w0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà { s1 | w1 }))
  bitri(c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà { s1 | w1 }), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà(c1 ` s0)))
  ax-mp((c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(c1)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà(c1 ` s0))), c1[Fn]c2)
  fnmpti(s0, c1, c2, { s1 | w1 })
  fnunirn(s0, c1, c2, c0)
  rexbiia(s0, c2, c0 ‚àà(c1 ` s0), c0 ‚àà { s1 | w1 })

  mpan2(s0 ‚àà c2, (c1 ` s0)= { s1 | w1 }, { s1 | w1 } ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt2(s0, c2, { s1 | w1 }, universe, c1)
  rexbidv(s0, c2, c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà { s1 | w1 }, w0)
  elabg(s1, c0, universe, w1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm rabfmpunirn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c1))), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c3, w1)))
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitr4i(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(c1))), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0))))
  abfmpunirn(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), w1))
  eqtri(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cab(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), w1))), cmpt(s0, c2, crab(s1, c3, w1)))
  mpteq2i(s0, c2, crab(s1, c3, w1), cab(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), w1)))
  df-rab(s1, c3, w1)
  zfausab(s1, c3, w1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c3), w1, wcel(c0, c3), w0)
  eleq1(cv(s1), c0, c3)
  pm4.71ri(wrex(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  rexlimivw(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, c3), w0), wcel(c0, universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c3), w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c3), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Membership in an element of a mapping function-defined family of sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2016.)

thm abfmpeld(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w1)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, cab(s1, w2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cab(s1, w2), universe))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(w2, w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w1))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w1))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w1))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  ex(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w1))
  an13s(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w1))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0)), wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w1, wcel(c2, cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w2))))
  adantl(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), wcel(c2, cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(c4, c0), cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0))
  syl6eq(cfv(c4, c0), cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), w0, wceq(cfv(c4, c0), csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w2))), wcel(csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w2)), universe))
  syl(w0, wcel(csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w2)), universe), wal(s0, wcel(cab(s1, w2), universe)))
  alrimiv(s0, w0, wcel(cab(s1, w2), universe))
  csbexg(s0, cab(s1, w2), universe, c0)
  fvmpts(s0, c0, c1, cab(s1, w2), universe, c4)
  csbab(s0, s1, c0, w2)
  sylan2(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wb(wcel(c2, cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w2))), w1), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w2), w1))))
  alrimiv(s1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w2), w1)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w2), w1))
  sbcied(s0, c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), w2, w1)
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), w0, wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  impl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), w0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w2, w1)))
  ancomsd(w0, wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1))
  elabgt(s1, c2, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, w2), w1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm abfmpeld(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî w1)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 | w2 })
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí { s1 | w2 } ‚àà ùïå)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî w1))), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî w1))), d(s1, c3))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî w1))), d(s1, c4))
  ex(w0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî w1))
  an13s(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî w1))
  bitrd((c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0)), c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0), w1, c2 ‚àà { s1 |[c0 / s0]w2 })
  adantl(c2 ‚àà c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), (c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî c2 ‚àà { s1 |[c0 / s0]w2 }))
  eleq2d(c2, (c4 ` c0), { s1 |[c0 / s0]w2 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0))
  syl6eq((c4 ` c0), { s1 |[c0 / s0]w2 }, [c0 / s0]{ s1 | w2 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0))
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà c1, w0, (c4 ` c0)=[c0 / s0]{ s1 | w2 }, [c0 / s0]{ s1 | w2 } ‚àà ùïå)
  syl(w0, [c0 / s0]{ s1 | w2 } ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(s0, { s1 | w2 } ‚àà ùïå))
  alrimiv(s0, w0, { s1 | w2 } ‚àà ùïå)
  csbexg(s0, { s1 | w2 }, universe, c0)
  fvmpts(s0, c0, c1, { s1 | w2 }, universe, c4)
  csbab(s0, s1, c0, w2)
  sylan2(c2 ‚àà c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), (c2 ‚àà { s1 |[c0 / s0]w2 } ‚Üî w1), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 = c2 ‚Üí([c0 / s0]w2 ‚Üî w1))))
  alrimiv(s1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), (s1 = c2 ‚Üí([c0 / s0]w2 ‚Üî w1)))
  ex((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), s1 = c2, ([c0 / s0]w2 ‚Üî w1))
  sbcied(s0, c0, c1, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0)‚àß s1 = c2), w2, w1)
  simpll(c0 ‚àà c1, w0, s1 = c2)
  impl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), s1 = c2, s0 = c0, (w2 ‚Üî w1))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, w0, ((s1 = c2 ‚àß s0 = c0)‚Üí(w2 ‚Üî w1)))
  ancomsd(w0, s1 = c2, s0 = c0, (w2 ‚Üî w1))
  elabgt(s1, c2, c3, [c0 / s0]w2, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚àà c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0), s1 = c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: abfmpel
blocks.content: Membership in an element of a mapping function-defined family of sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm abfmpel(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w0))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, cab(s1, w1)))
  -| wcel(cab(s1, w1), universe)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w0)), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w0)), diffsc(s1, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w0)), diffsc(s1, c4))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), w0, wcel(c2, cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(c4, c0)), wcel(c2, cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(c4, c0), cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl6eq(cfv(c4, c0), cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w1)), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w1))), wcel(csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w1)), universe))
  csbex(s0, c0, cab(s1, w1))
  fvmpts(s0, c0, c1, cab(s1, w1), universe, c4)
  csbab(s0, s1, c0, w1)
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wcel(c2, cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))), w0))
  sylan2(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))), w0), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w0))))
  alrimiv(s1, wcel(c0, c1), wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w0))
  sbcied(s0, c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), w1, w0)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  adantll(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  ancoms(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  elabgt(s1, c2, c3, wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm abfmpel(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 | w1 })
  ‚ä£ { s1 | w1 } ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c2)‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî w0)), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî w0)), d(s1, c3))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî w0)), d(s1, c4))
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0), w0, c2 ‚àà { s1 |[c0 / s0]w1 })
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c2 ‚àà(c4 ` c0)‚Üî c2 ‚àà { s1 |[c0 / s0]w1 }))
  eleq2d(c2, (c4 ` c0), { s1 |[c0 / s0]w1 }, c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl6eq((c4 ` c0), { s1 |[c0 / s0]w1 }, [c0 / s0]{ s1 | w1 }, c0 ‚àà c1)
  mpan2(c0 ‚àà c1, (c4 ` c0)=[c0 / s0]{ s1 | w1 }, [c0 / s0]{ s1 | w1 } ‚àà ùïå)
  csbex(s0, c0, { s1 | w1 })
  fvmpts(s0, c0, c1, { s1 | w1 }, universe, c4)
  csbab(s0, s1, c0, w1)
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c2 ‚àà { s1 |[c0 / s0]w1 } ‚Üî w0))
  sylan2(c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà { s1 |[c0 / s0]w1 } ‚Üî w0), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 = c2 ‚Üí([c0 / s0]w1 ‚Üî w0))))
  alrimiv(s1, c0 ‚àà c1, (s1 = c2 ‚Üí([c0 / s0]w1 ‚Üî w0)))
  ex(c0 ‚àà c1, s1 = c2, ([c0 / s0]w1 ‚Üî w0))
  sbcied(s0, c0, c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 = c2), w1, w0)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, s1 = c2)
  adantll(c0 ‚àà c1, s1 = c2, s0 = c0, (w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ancoms(s1 = c2, s0 = c0, (w1 ‚Üî w0))
  elabgt(s1, c2, c3, [c0 / s0]w1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, s1 = c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: fmptdF
blocks.content: Domain and codomain of the mapping operation; deduction form. This version of ~ fmptd uses bound-variable hypothesis instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fmptdF(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c3, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c1, c2))
  sylib(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c1, c2), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c2)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c1, w0, wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c2))
  3imtr3i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c2), wsb(hs0, s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(c3, c2)))
  sbimi(hs0, s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c3, c2))
  bitri(wsb(hs0, s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  sban(hs0, s0, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  anbi12i(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  sbf(hs0, s0, w0)
  clelsb3f(hs0, s0, c1)
  bitri(wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(c3, c2)))
  sbsbc(hs0, s0, wcel(c3, c2))
  bitri(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c2), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  sbcel12(s0, cv(hs0), c3, c2)
  eleq2i(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), c2)
  ax-mp(wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  csbconstgf(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c2)
  fmpt(hs0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))
  cbvmptf(s0, hs0, c1, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  feq1i(c0, c1, c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm fmptdF(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c3 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3): c1 ‚Üí c2))
  sylib(w0, ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3): c1 ‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,[hs0 / s0]c3 ‚àà c2))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c1, w0, [hs0 / s0]c3 ‚àà c2)
  3imtr3i((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), [hs0 / s0]c3 ‚àà c2, [hs0 / s0](w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), [hs0 / s0]c3 ‚àà c2)
  sbimi(hs0, s0, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), c3 ‚àà c2)
  bitri([hs0 / s0](w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), ([hs0 / s0]w0 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]s0 ‚àà c1))
  sban(hs0, s0, w0, s0 ‚àà c1)
  anbi12i([hs0 / s0]w0, [hs0 / s0]s0 ‚àà c1, w0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  sbf(hs0, s0, w0)
  clelsb3f(hs0, s0, c1)
  bitri([hs0 / s0]c3 ‚àà c2, [hs0 / s0]c3 ‚àà c2, [hs0 / s0]c3 ‚àà c2)
  sbsbc(hs0, s0, c3 ‚àà c2)
  bitri([hs0 / s0]c3 ‚àà c2, [hs0 / s0]c3 ‚àà c2, [hs0 / s0]c3 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c2)
  sbcel12(s0, hs0, c3, c2)
  eleq2i([hs0 / s0]c3, [hs0 / s0]c2, c2)
  ax-mp([hs0 / s0]c2 = c2, hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  csbconstgf(s0, hs0, universe, c2)
  fmpt(hs0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c3, c2, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3))
  cbvmptf(s0, hs0, c1, c3, [hs0 / s0]c3)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c3)
  feq1i(c0, c1, c2, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fmptcof2
blocks.content: Composition of two functions expressed as ordered-pair class abstractions. (Contributed by FL, 21-Jun-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 10-May-2017.)

blocks.name: fcomptf
blocks.content: Express composition of two functions as a maps-to applying both in sequence. This version has one less distinct variable restriction compared to ~ fcompt . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fcomptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  fmptcof(s0, hs0, c0, c3, c4, cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)))
  ralrimi(s0, c4, wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  nfan(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1))
  nff(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nff(s0, c3, c4, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c4)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  ex(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  adantll(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, cv(s0))
  sylib(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wfn(c3, c4))
  adantl(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wfn(c3, c4))
  ffn(c3, c4, c1)
  dffn5f(s0, c3, c4)
  sylib(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, c1))
  adantr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c1), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  dffn5(hs0, c0, c1)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm fcomptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1))‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c3)=(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(c0 `(c3 ` s0))))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  fmptcof(s0, hs0, c0, c3, c4, (c0 `(c3 ` s0)), (c3 ` s0), c1, (c0 ` hs0), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)))
  ralrimi(s0, c4, ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)), (c3 ` s0)‚àà c1)
  nfan(s0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1))
  nff(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nff(s0, c3, c4, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c4)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  ex(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)), s0 ‚àà c4, (c3 ` s0)‚àà c1)
  adantll((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), s0 ‚àà c4, (c3 ` s0)‚àà c1)
  ffvelrn(c3, c4, c1, s0)
  sylib(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)), c3 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(c3 ` s0)), c3[Fn]c4)
  adantl((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), c3[Fn]c4)
  ffn(c3, c4, c1)
  dffn5f(s0, c3, c4)
  sylib(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)‚àß(c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1)), c0 =(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(c0 ` hs0)), c0[Fn]c1)
  adantr((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), (c3 : c4 ‚Üí c1), c0[Fn]c1)
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  dffn5(hs0, c0, c1)

  diff.hs0.c((c0 `(c3 ` s0)))
  diff.hs0.c((c3 ` s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: acunirnmpt
blocks.content: Axiom of choice for the union of the range of a mapping to function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Nov-2019.)

thm acunirnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cuni(c0)), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))

  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cuni(c0)), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2))))), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cuni(c0)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))))
  mpd(w0, wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cuni(c0)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c0, wne(cv(s1), emptycls)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c0, w0, wne(cv(s1), emptycls))
  r19.29a(s2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  eqnetrd(cv(s1), emptycls, c2, wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))

  simplll(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c2))

  syl5eqel(c0, universe, crn(cmpt(s2, c1, c2)), w0)
  3syl(w0, wcel(crn(cmpt(s2, c1, c2)), universe), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cmpt(s2, c1, c2), universe))
  mptexg(s2, c1, c3, c2)
  rnexg(cmpt(s2, c1, c2), universe)
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wi(wral(s1, c0, wne(cv(s1), emptycls)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cuni(c0)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))), wi(wral(s1, cv(hs0), wne(cv(s1), emptycls)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wne(cv(s1), emptycls)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c0, wne(cv(s1), emptycls)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cuni(c0)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))))
  raleq(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wne(cv(s1), emptycls))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wf(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cuni(c0)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wf(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wf(cv(s0), c0, cuni(c0)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))

  mpd(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))

  reximdva(s2, c1, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2))
  ex(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2))

  simpr(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  diff.wne.s(s2, cv(s1), emptycls)

thm acunirnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0 ` s1)‚àà c2)))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ c0 = ran((s2 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)

  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0 ` s1)‚àà c2)))), ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ` s1)‚àà s1))))

  syl2anc((((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0)‚àß s2 ‚àà c1)‚àß s1 = c2), c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ, w0, s2 ‚àà c1)
  simplll(w0, s1 ‚àà c0, s2 ‚àà c1, s1 = c2)
  simplr((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0), s2 ‚àà c1, s1 = c2)
  syl(w0, (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ` s1)‚àà s1)))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eqel(c0, universe, ran((s2 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)), w0)
  3syl(w0, ran((s2 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà c3, (s2 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà ùïå)
  mptexg(s2, c1, c3, c2)

  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ` s1)‚àà s1)))), (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : hs0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs0,(s0 ` s1)‚àà s1)))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : hs0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs0,(s0 ` s1)‚àà s1))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ` s1)‚àà s1))))
  raleq(s1, hs0, c0, s1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)

  ralimdva(s1, c0, w0, (s0 ` s1)‚àà s1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0 ` s1)‚àà c2))
  ex((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0), (s0 ` s1)‚àà s1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0 ` s1)‚àà c2))
  mpd(((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0)‚àß(s0 ` s1)‚àà s1), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0 ` s1)‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, s1 = c2))

  eleq2i(s1, c0, ran((s2 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)))
  ax-mp((s1 ‚àà ran((s2 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, s1 = c2)), s1 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(s1)
  elrnmpt(s2, s1, universe, (s2 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), c1, c2)
  eqid((s2 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))

  simpllr((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0), (s0 ` s1)‚àà s1, s2 ‚àà c1, s1 = c2)
  simpr((((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0)‚àß(s0 ` s1)‚àà s1)‚àß s2 ‚àà c1), s1 = c2)
  diff.wne.s(s2, s1, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ` s1)‚àà s1)))))

  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm acunirnmpt2f(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  simplr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s2, c1, c4))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))

  syl5eqel(cmpt(s2, c1, c4), universe, cmpt(hs1, c1, csb(s2, cv(hs1), c4)), wcel(c1, c3))

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wral(s1, cv(hs2), wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cv(hs2), c1), wral(s1, cv(hs2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))

blocks.name: aciunf1
blocks.content: Choice in an index union. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm aciunf1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(wf1(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, c1), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), wral(s2, ciun(s1, c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cv(s2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wex(s0, wa(wf1(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, c1), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), wral(s2, ciun(s1, c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cv(s2))))), wex(s0, wa(wf1(cv(s0), ciun(s1, crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)), c1), ciun(s1, crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), wral(s2, ciun(s1, crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)), c1), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cv(s2))))))
  aciunf1lem(s0, s1, s2, crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)), c1, universe, c3, w0)
  sylancr(w0, wcel(crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)), universe), wss(crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)), c0), wcel(c0, c2))
  ssrab2(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls))
  ssexg(crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)), c0, c2)
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)))), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s1), crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls))), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(c1, emptycls))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s1), crab(s1, c0, wne(c1, emptycls))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(c1, emptycls)))

thm ofoprabco(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[oF(c1)]c2)=(c3 ‚àò c4))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c5 ‚Üí c6))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 : c5 ‚Üí c7))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c8)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 =(s0 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ <(c0 ` s0),(c2 ` s0)>))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 =(s1 ‚àà c6, s2 ‚àà c7 ‚Ü¶(s1[c1]s2)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4rd((c0[oF(c1)]c2), (c3 ‚àò c4), (s0 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶(c3 `(c4 ` s0))), (s0 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶((c0 ` s0)[c1](c2 ` s0))), w0)

  3eqtr2d((c3 `(c4 ` s0)), ((c0 ` s0)[c1](c2 ` s0)), (c3 ` <(c0 ` s0),(c2 ` s0)>), ((c0 ` s0)[c3](c2 ` s0)), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5))

  fvmpt2d(s0, c5, c4, <(c0 ` s0),(c2 ` s0)>, (c6 √ó c7), w0)
  a1i((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5), ((c0 ` s0)[c3](c2 ` s0))=(c3 ` <(c0 ` s0),(c2 ` s0)>))
  df-ov((c0 ` s0), c3, (c2 ` s0))
  ovmpt2d(s1, s2, (c0 ` s0), c3, (c2 ` s0), ((c0 ` s0)[c1](c2 ` s0)), c6, c7, (s1[c1]s2), universe, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà c5, c3 =(s1 ‚àà c6, s2 ‚àà c7 ‚Ü¶(s1[c1]s2)))
  oveq12d(s1, c1, s2, (c0 ` s0), (c2 ` s0), ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5)‚àß(s1 =(c0 ` s0)‚àß s2 =(c2 ` s0))))
  simprl((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5), s1 =(c0 ` s0), s2 =(c2 ` s0))
  simprr((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5), s1 =(c0 ` s0), s2 =(c2 ` s0))
  ovexd((c0 ` s0), c1, (c2 ` s0), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5))
  syl2anc(w0, (c3 ‚àò c4)=(s0 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶(c3 `(c4 ` s0))), (c3 :(c6 √ó c7)‚Üí ùïå), (c4 : c5 ‚Üí(c6 √ó c7)))
  mpbiri(w0, (c3 :(c6 √ó c7)‚Üí ùïå), ((s1 ‚àà c6, s2 ‚àà c7 ‚Ü¶(s1[c1]s2)):(c6 √ó c7)‚Üí ùïå))
  mpbi(((s1 ‚àà c6, s2 ‚àà c7 ‚Ü¶(s1[c1]s2)):(c6 √ó c7)‚Üí ùïå), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c6, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c7,(s1[c1]s2)‚àà ùïå)))

  eqid((s1 ‚àà c6, s2 ‚àà c7 ‚Ü¶(s1[c1]s2)))

  fmpt3d(s0, c4, c5, (c6 √ó c7), <(c0 ` s0),(c2 ` s0)>, w0)

  offval2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c5, (c0 ` s0), (c2 ` s0), c8, c6, c7, w0)
  ffvelrnda(s0, c5, c0, c6, w0)
  ffvelrnda(s0, c5, c2, c7, w0)
  feqmptd(s0, c0, c5, c6, w0)
  feqmptd(s0, c2, c5, c7, w0)
  diff.co.s(s1, (c0 ` s0), c1, (c2 ` s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, s0)
  diff.co.s(s2, (c0 ` s0), c1, (c2 ` s0))

blocks.name: funcnvmpt

blocks.origin:
thm funcnvmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wal(s0, wrmo(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5bb(w0, wfun(ccnv(c0)), wal(s0, wrmo(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  bitri(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))))
  mpbiran(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  dffun6f(s0, s1, ccnv(c0))
  nfcv(s0, ccnv(c0))
  nfcnv(s1, c0)
  albii(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1))), wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  mobii(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  albidv(s0, w0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrmo(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl6bbr(w0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wrmo(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  mobid(s1, w0, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  3bitr4rd(w0, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  bian1d(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  bitr3d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  syl5eq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2, cfv(cmpt(s1, c1, c2), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  fveq1i(c0, cv(s1), cmpt(s1, c1, c2))
  fvmpt2f(s1, c1, c2, c3)
  syl5bbr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  eqcom(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))
  sylancr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wfun(c0), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c0)))
  biimpar(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c0)))
  funbrfvb(c0, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  syl5bb(w0, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wfun(c0))
  funmpt2(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  funbrfv2b(c0, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  anbi1d(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  eleq2d(cv(s1), cdm(c0), c1, w0)
  syl6reqr(cdm(c0), c1, crab(s1, c1, wcel(c2, universe)), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(c1, crab(s1, c1, wcel(c2, universe))), wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
  ralrimi(s1, c1, w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  elexd(c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  rabid2f(s1, c1, wcel(c2, universe))
  dmmpt(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  df-rmo(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
}

thm funcnvmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(Fun(`' c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 = c2))))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5bb(w0, Fun(`' c0), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 = c2)), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s1[c0]s0)))
  bitri(Fun(`' c0), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s1[c0]s0)), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s0[`' c0]s1)))
  mpbiran(Fun(`' c0), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s0[`' c0]s1)), Rel(`' c0))
  relcnv(c0)
  dffun6f(s0, s1, `' c0)
  nfcv(s0, `' c0)
  nfcnv(s1, c0)
  albii(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s0[`' c0]s1), ‚àÉ*(s1, s1[c0]s0))
  mobii(s1, s0[`' c0]s1, s1[c0]s0)
  brcnv(s0, c0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  albidv(s0, w0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s1[c0]s0), ‚àÉ*(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 = c2))
  syl6bbr(w0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s1[c0]s0), ‚àÉ*(s1 ‚àà c1, s0 = c2), ‚àÉ*(s1,(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c2)))
  mobid(s1, w0, s1[c0]s0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c2))
  3bitr4rd(w0, s1[c0]s0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 = c2), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1[c0]s0), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c0 ` s1)= s0))
  bian1d(w0, s1 ‚àà c1, s1[c0]s0, (c0 ` s1)= s0)
  pm5.32da(w0, s1 ‚àà c1, s0 = c2, s1[c0]s0)
  bitr3d((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), s0 = c2, s1[c0]s0, s0 =(c0 ` s1))
  eqeq2d(s0, (c0 ` s1), c2, (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), (c0 ` s1)= c2, s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)
  simpr(w0, s1 ‚àà c1)
  syl5eq((c0 ` s1), c2, ((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)` s1), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  fveq1i(c0, s1, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  fvmpt2f(s1, c1, c2, c3)
  syl5bbr((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), s0 =(c0 ` s1), s1[c0]s0, (c0 ` s1)= s0)
  eqcom((c0 ` s1), s0)
  sylancr((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), ((c0 ` s1)= s0 ‚Üî s1[c0]s0), Fun(c0), s1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  biimpar(w0, s1 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  funbrfvb(c0, s1, s0)
  syl5bb(w0, s1[c0]s0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c0 ` s1)= s0), (s1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s1)= s0))
  ax-mp((s1[c0]s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 ` s1)= s0)), Fun(c0))
  funmpt2(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  funbrfv2b(c0, s1, s0)
  anbi1d(w0, s1 ‚àà dom(c0), (c0 ` s1)= s0, s1 ‚àà c1)
  eleq2d(s1, dom(c0), c1, w0)
  syl6reqr(dom(c0), c1, { s1 ‚àà c1 | c2 ‚àà ùïå }, w0)
  sylibr(w0, c1 = { s1 ‚àà c1 | c2 ‚àà ùïå }, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  ralrimi(s1, c1, w0, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  ex(w0, s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elexd(c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1))
  rabid2f(s1, c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  dmmpt(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  df-rmo(s1, c1, s0 = c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: funcnv5mpt
blocks.content: Two ways to say that a function in maps-to notation is single-rooted. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Mar-2017.)

thm funcnv5mpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(c2, c3))))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, wfun(ccnv(c0)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(c2, c3)))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  funcnvmpt(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  syl6bbr(w0, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(c2, c3)))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wal(hs0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  ralbida(s0, c1, w0, wral(s1, c1, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(c2, c3))), wal(hs0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  syl6bb(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wral(s1, c1, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(c2, c3))), wal(hs0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c1, wal(hs0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  ralbidv(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(c2, c3)), wal(hs0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  3bitr4g(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(c2, c3)), wal(hs0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(wn(wne(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  imbi1d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wne(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))
  syl5bb(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wne(c2, c3)), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), wceq(c2, c3))
  nne(c2, c3)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wceq(c2, c3), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))), wcel(c2, c4))
  eqvincg(hs0, c2, c4, c3)
  bitri(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(c2, c3)), wi(wn(wne(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wo(wne(c2, c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  orcom(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(c2, c3))
  df-or(wne(c2, c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  19.23v(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  ralcom4(s1, hs0, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  bitr4i(wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wal(hs0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wal(hs0, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  albii(hs0, wrmo(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  rmo4f(s0, s1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  ralcom4(s0, hs0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm funcnv5mpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(Fun(`' c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0 = s1 ‚à® c2 ‚â† c3)))))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c2 = c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, Fun(`' c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0 = s1 ‚à® c2 ‚â† c3))), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2)))
  funcnvmpt(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  syl6bbr(w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0 = s1 ‚à® c2 ‚â† c3))), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1)))))
  ralbida(s0, c1, w0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0 = s1 ‚à® c2 ‚â† c3)), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1))))
  syl6bb((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0 = s1 ‚à® c2 ‚â† c3)), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs0,((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1))))
  ralbidv(s1, c1, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), (s0 = s1 ‚à® c2 ‚â† c3), ‚àÄ(hs0,((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1)))
  3bitr4g((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), (s0 = s1 ‚à® c2 ‚â† c3), ‚àÄ(hs0,((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1)), (¬¨ c2 ‚â† c3 ‚Üí s0 = s1), (‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3))‚Üí s0 = s1))
  imbi1d((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), ¬¨ c2 ‚â† c3, s0 = s1, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)))
  syl5bb((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), ¬¨ c2 ‚â† c3, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)), c2 = c3)
  nne(c2, c3)
  syl((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), (c2 = c3 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3))), c2 ‚àà c4)
  eqvincg(hs0, c2, c4, c3)
  bitri((s0 = s1 ‚à® c2 ‚â† c3), (¬¨ c2 ‚â† c3 ‚Üí s0 = s1), (c2 ‚â† c3 ‚à® s0 = s1))
  orcom(s0 = s1, c2 ‚â† c3)
  df-or(c2 ‚â† c3, s0 = s1)
  19.23v(hs0, (hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3), s0 = s1)
  ralcom4(s1, hs0, c1, ((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1))
  bitr4i(‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1)))), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1)))))
  albii(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1))))
  rmo4f(s0, s1, c1, hs0 = c2, hs0 = c3)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfv(s0, hs0 = c3)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c2, c3, s0 = s1)
  ralcom4(s0, hs0, c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs0 = c3)‚Üí s0 = s1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 = s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: funcnv4mpt
blocks.content: Two ways to say that a function in maps-to notation is single-rooted. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm funcnv4mpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wfun(ccnv(c0)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(csb(s2, cv(s0), c2), csb(s2, cv(s1), c2)))))))
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wnfc(s2, c1)
  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)

blocks.name: fcnvgreu
blocks.content: If the converse of a relation ` A ` is a function, exactly one point of its graph has a given second element (that is, function value). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)

blocks.name: rnmpt2ss
blocks.content: The range of an operation given by the maps-to notation as a subset. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rnmpt2ss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wss(crn(c4), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, crn(c4), c3, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))))
  syl5bi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  abeq2i(hs0, crn(c4), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  rnmpt2(hs0, s0, s1, c4, c0, c1, c2)
  ex(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl(wa(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  r19.29d2r(s0, s1, c0, c1, wa(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpl(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  simpr(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  rexlimivv(s0, s1, c0, c1, wa(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  biimparc(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm rnmpt2ss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3))‚Üí ran(c4)‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, ran(c4), c3, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)))
  syl5bi(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)), hs0 ‚àà ran(c4), hs0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2)))
  abeq2i(hs0, ran(c4), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2)))
  rnmpt2(hs0, s0, s1, c4, c0, c1, c2)
  ex(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2)), hs0 ‚àà c3)
  syl((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2))), hs0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs0 = c2))))
  r19.29d2r(s0, s1, c0, c1, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2))), c2 ‚àà c3, hs0 = c2)
  simpl(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2)))
  simpr(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c2)))
  rexlimivv(s0, s1, c0, c1, (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs0 = c2), hs0 ‚àà c3)
  a1i((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1), ((c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c3))
  biimparc(c2 ‚àà c3, hs0 = c2, hs0 ‚àà c3)
  eleq1(hs0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ran(c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
