}

blocks.name: mptssALT
blocks.content: Deduce subset relation of mapping-to function graphs from a subset relation of domains. Alternative proof of ~ mptss . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-May-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mptssALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3sstr4g(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wss(c0, c1))
  ssopab2dv(s0, hs0, wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  anim1d(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  ssel(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mptssALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚äÜ(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3sstr4g((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)}, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c2)}, c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  ssopab2dv(s0, hs0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 = c2), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c2))
  anim1d(c0 ‚äÜ c1, s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 = c2, s0 ‚àà c1)
  ssel(c0, c1, s0)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: partfun
blocks.content: Rewrite a function defined by parts, using a mapping and an if construct, into a union of functions on disjoint domains. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm partfun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cun(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, cdif(c0, c1), c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr3i(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cun(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, cdif(c0, c1), c3)), cmpt(s0, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1)), cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cun(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cmpt(s0, cdif(c0, c1), cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  mptun(s0, cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1), cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  mpteq12i(s0, cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1)), cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), c0, cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  inundif(c0, c1)
  eqid(cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  uneq12i(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cmpt(s0, cdif(c0, c1), cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, cdif(c0, c1), c3))
  mpteq2ia(s0, cin(c0, c1), cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), c2)
  iftrued(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  elinel2(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  mpteq2ia(s0, cdif(c0, c1), cif(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), c3)
  iffalsed(c2, c3, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eldifn(cv(s0), c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm partfun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3))=((s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚Ü¶ c2)‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c1)‚Ü¶ c3))
} = {
  3eqtr3i((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3)), ((s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚Ü¶ c2)‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c1)‚Ü¶ c3)), (s0 ‚àà((c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚ãÉ(c0 \ c1))‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3)), ((s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3))‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c1)‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3))))
  mptun(s0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1), (c0 \ c1), if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3))
  mpteq12i(s0, ((c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚ãÉ(c0 \ c1)), if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3), c0, if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3))
  inundif(c0, c1)
  eqid(if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3))
  uneq12i((s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3)), (s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c1)‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3)), (s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚Ü¶ c2), (s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c1)‚Ü¶ c3))
  mpteq2ia(s0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1), if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3), c2)
  iftrued(c2, c3, s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c1), s0 ‚àà c1)
  elinel2(s0, c0, c1)
  mpteq2ia(s0, (c0 \ c1), if(s0 ‚àà c1, c2, c3), c3)
  iffalsed(c2, c3, s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c1), s0 ‚àà c1)
  eldifn(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: dfcnv2
blocks.content: Alternative definition of the converse of a relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfcnv2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wss(crn(c0), c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqrelrdv(hs0, hs1, ccnv(c0), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))))), wss(crn(c0), c1))
  relcnv(c0)
  mpbir(wrel(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))))), wral(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))))))
  rgenw(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))))))
  relxp(csn(cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))))
  reliun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  syl6bbr(wss(crn(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0))))))
  syl6bbr(wss(crn(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0))))
  pm4.71rd(wss(crn(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  ex(wss(crn(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  sylan2(wss(crn(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)))
  syl6eleqr(cv(hs0), crn(c0), cdm(ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0)))
  opeldm(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), ccnv(c0))
  df-rn(c0)
  ssel2(crn(c0), c1, cv(hs0))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0)))
  elimasn(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opeliunxp2(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  imaeq2d(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  sneq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(crn(c0), c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(crn(c0), c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm dfcnv2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (ran(c0)‚äÜ c1 ‚Üí `' c0 = ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó(`' c0 " { s0 }))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqrelrdv(hs0, hs1, `' c0, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó(`' c0 " { s0 }))), ran(c0)‚äÜ c1)
  relcnv(c0)
  mpbir(Rel(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó(`' c0 " { s0 })))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, Rel(({ s0 } √ó(`' c0 " { s0 })))))
  rgenw(s0, c1, Rel(({ s0 } √ó(`' c0 " { s0 }))))
  relxp({ s0 }, (`' c0 " { s0 }))
  reliun(s0, c1, ({ s0 } √ó(`' c0 " { s0 })))
  syl6bbr(ran(c0)‚äÜ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà `' c0, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó(`' c0 " { s0 }))), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà(`' c0 " { hs0 })))
  syl6bbr(ran(c0)‚äÜ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà `' c0, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà(`' c0 " { hs0 })), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà `' c0))
  pm4.71rd(ran(c0)‚äÜ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà `' c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  ex(ran(c0)‚äÜ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà `' c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  sylan2(ran(c0)‚äÜ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà `' c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà ran(c0))
  syl6eleqr(hs0, ran(c0), dom(`' c0), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà `' c0)

  anbi2i(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 ‚àà(`' c0 " { hs0 }), < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà `' c0)
  elimasn(hs1, `' c0, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opeliunxp2(s0, hs0, hs1, c1, (`' c0 " { s0 }), (`' c0 " { hs0 }))
  imaeq2d(`' c0, { s0 }, { hs0 }, s0 = hs0)
  sneq(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(`' c0)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó(`' c0 " { s0 }))))
  diff.hs1.c(`' c0)
  diff.hs1.c(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,({ s0 } √ó(`' c0 " { s0 }))))
  diff.hs0.w(ran(c0)‚äÜ c1)
  diff.hs1.w(ran(c0)‚äÜ c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, `' c0, { hs0 })
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

}
